title: Synchronize installation of new index across the slaves
description: The time required for slaves to download an index may vary.  So different slaves may have different versions of index . if the slaves can reach a consensus on when to install the new index , all users will see same data always

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content:
Closing very old issue that appears to not be a real problem any more. Please feel free to re-open should anyone feel this issue needs a resolution.

In these Cloud / NRT days we'll probably not have the need to optimize master/slave stuff...
